segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and I'm totally caught off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is pouring water over the edge, whoa.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't noticed at all, that's shocking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water puddle, unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, a boy on a stool reaching high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's leaning back, about to go over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar, sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by reaching too, what a team.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, so unexpected inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such hazards in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies spilling out maybe, this is wild.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything's happening at once, I'm stunned.
segments.speaker: PAR
